answers.answer: Unless you have excessive swelling and protein in your urine as well it should be fine. Did you get tested for Gestational diabetes?

They say you gain the most weight in the last trimester. My weight gain had been really good my whole pregnancy also, only 3or so lbs per month and then in a 2wk period I gained 8lbs! I almost cried! Then the next 2 wks I gained under 1lb. I wouldn't worry at all

question: Im overweight and 33 Weeks pregnant. So far this ive only gained 4 lbs total  which my doctor said was fine. But this past week i've gained 5 lbs! This concerns me alot considering Ive gained less than that in 32 weeks prior. Should I be worried?
title: rapid weight gain?
